titles: Charles by the grace of God, King of Great Britaine ... forsamekle as in the generall submissions made to vs concerning the few fearmes and few mealles of erections teyndes of other mens lands ...
author: Scotland. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
notes: At head of title: God saue the King.
Second pt. of title from text.
Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
"Giuen vnder our signet at Haly-rude-house the eight daye of August and of our raigne the fourth yeare. 1628."
Reproduction of original in the Town House (Aberdeen, Scotland). Charter Room.
